---
title: "Chapter 7: Introduction to data analysis in R"
---

In this chapter we will bring together all the concepts we have seen sofar and perform a simple analysis of a dataset, including descriptive statistics, hypothesis testing and plotting. 


We will then briefly see some of the modern tidyverse-related tools to perform these steps more efficiently and elegantly.
